sentences.en: Climatic Features: Climate of Aba prefecture is complex and varied for the complicated geography and landform.
sentences.cn: 气候特点: 阿坝地区的气候因为复杂的地理位置和地貌而显得复杂而多变.

sentences.en: Coastal landform is changeful, much cliff, have extensive bay and beach again.
sentences.cn: 海岸地形多变, 多悬崖峭壁, 又有辽阔的海湾与沙滩.

sentences.en: Condition of special landform, grade water natural resources, suit piscatorial development.
sentences.cn: 非凡的地形 、 优质的水资源条件, 适合渔业的发展.

sentences.en: Danxia landform is the continental red bed landform with escarpments.
sentences.cn: 丹霞地貌是指有陡崖的陆相红层地貌.

sentences.en: Firstly, for changeable height of landform and thick soft soil, deformation problem of subgrade is studied.

sentences.en: Landform of this paragraphs of surface is complex, construction difficulty is great, the demand is high.

sentences.en: Micro - landform and micro - climate could exert great influence on conductor icing.

sentences.cn: 同时还抓住山区地理地形.

sentences.en: The Changde landform has yanshan movement characteristic.
sentences.cn: 常德市地貌具有燕山运动的特征.

sentences.en: The difference is mainly in the tone not in the drainage pattern or landform.
sentences.cn: 所不同的主要在色调,而不在于水系型式或地形.

sentences.en: The distribution was consistent with local yield and landform.
sentences.cn: 分布情况与实地的产量和地形地貌基本一致.

sentences.en: The landform of special diversity, landforms, appropriate climate and earthy condition, suit to cultivate yam.
sentences.cn: 非凡多样的地形 、 地貌, 适宜的气候和土质条件, 适合种植薯蓣.

sentences.en: The special landform of this harbour makes it perfect anchor ground.
sentences.cn: 这个港湾地形特殊,是绝佳的泊地.

sentences.en: The tourism value of the plateau landform has not been recognized before.
sentences.cn: 以往对这种地质遗迹资源的旅游价值认识不足.

sentences.en: These mathematical definitions make basic landform shape concept of limit determine nat.
sentences.cn: 继而给出了如斜坡、山、山脊、凹地、谷地、鞍部等基本地貌形态的数学定义.

sentences.en: This small country has an amazing variety of landforms.
sentences.cn: 这个小国家拥有令人惊叹的丰富的地貌类型。

trans.tran_en: A landform is any natural feature of the Earth's surface, such as a hill, a lake, or a beach
